document.full_text: administration officials said the white house was infuriated by philip j. crowley's remarks on the military's treatment of the soldier imprisoned on charges of leaking documents to wikileaks.
document.title: official exits state dept. after jabs at pentagon
lines_and_colors: administration officials said the white house was infuriated by philip j. crowley's remarks on the military's treatment of the soldier imprisoned on charges of leaking documents to wikileaks.
